Specific function: High growth rate, gives bacteria the ability to adapt quickly to new open niches

D, E, Y, V, C, S, K, R
Specific function: Allows the bacteria to eat a very specific nutrient (that other bacteria can't eat)
Fate: Bacteria that don't have a high growth but do have this can survive

Specific function: Strict anaerobe, bacteria can only survive in no-oxygen conditions
